page.title: 11WHALTON PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: The area is covered by three tier Local Government - County Council, Borough Council and Parish Council. Only one tier is based in this survey block -{Whalton Parish Council}whose 6 members in 2 wards are elected by the voters in the Civil Parish of Whalton and which meets 4 times per year or more if circumstances require it. The Council oversees and comments on planning applications, deals with the Village Green, obtains grants for the Churchyard and Village Hall and provides other minor services including keeping a watching brief on all aspects of life in the area. Other services are provided either by the Borough or County Council or by Central Government.
